plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Sélectionner le mode d'installation du b: Select the broker installation mode (see documentation)
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Installer, désinstaller ou télécharger l: Install, uninstall, or download the Mosquitto broker client certificate
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Identifiant et mot de passe de connexion: MQTT broker login and password separated by colons
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Topic racine pour piloter Jeedom et sur: Root topic to drive Jeedom and on which it sends its events
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Cocher la case pour transmettre tous les: Check the box to forward all events to the MQTT broker. You can also do this per device (to not forward everything) in the advanced configuration of the device you want to forward or by the Manage forwarded devices button
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Le message est envoyé une seule fois: The message is sent only once
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Le message est envoyé au moins une fois: The message is sent at least once
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Le message est distribué une seule fois: The message is delivered only once
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Topic des autres jeedom qu'il faut écout: Topic of other jeedom that you should listen to (separated by ,)
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Liste des plugins Jeedom abonnés au plug: List of Jeedom plugins subscribed to the plugin
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Sauvegarder et relancer l'installation d: Save and restart the installation of mosquitto to take into account the modifications of this configuration field
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Confirmez-vous suppression de l\\'abonne: Do you confirm deletion of the subscription:
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Confirmez-vous la désinstallation du bro: Do you confirm the uninstallation of the local Mosquitto broker?

plugins\/mqtt2\/desktop\/modal\/cmd.disc.Aucune commande découverte pour cet équi: No command found for this equipment

plugins\/mqtt2\/desktop\/php\/mqtt2.php.Aucun équipement MQTT trouvé, cliquez su: No MQTT equipment found, click "Add" to get started
plugins\/mqtt2\/desktop\/php\/mqtt2.php.Permet la création simplifiée des comman: Allows simplified creation of orders (be careful, this consumes more resources)

plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/php\/jeeMqtt2.php.Vous n\\'êtes pas autorisé à effectuer c: You are not authorized to perform this action

plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Aucun dossier SSL trouvé, veuillez rétab: No SSL folder found, please restore rights to folders and files from the Jeedom configuration (OS/DB tab) then click on the Install Mosquitto button
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Installation locale du broker Mosquitto: Local installation of the Mosquitto broker in progress
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Le plugin Docker management doit être in: The Docker management plugin must be installed
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Le plugin Docker management doit être ac: The Docker management plugin must be activated
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Pause de 120s le temps de l'installation: 120s pause while installing Docker Management plugin dependencies
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Délai maximum autorisé pour l'installati: Maximum time allowed for the installation of dependencies exceeded
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Un broker Mosquitto est déjà installé en: A Mosquitto broker is already installed locally on the machine. Please uninstall it
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Désinstallation du broker Mosquitto en c: Uninstalling the Mosquitto broker in progress
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Veuillez vous référer à la documentation: Please refer to the documentation to remove the Mosquitto broker managed by the Docker Management plugin
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Cette action est impossible avec un broc: This action is impossible with a remote brocker
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Veuillez renseigner l'adresse complète d: Please fill in the full address of the broker
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Service mosquitto non lancé, je lance un: Mosquitto service not launched, I launch an installation
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Impossible de démarrer le démon MQTT Man: Failed to start MQTT Manager daemon, check logs

plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.La configuration d\\'un template doit êt: Template configuration must be an array
